text: Xenogears is a Japanese role-playing video game developed and published by Square for the PlayStation. ==References== Category:1998 video games Category:Video games about dissociative identity disorder Category:Existentialist video games Category:Gnosticism Category:Japanese role-playing video games Category:Martial arts video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Production I.G Category:Science fiction video games Category:Turn-based role-playing video games Category:Video games about cannibalism Category:Video games about impact events Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Xenogears
